content:
I think that's a wonderful message! It's simple, heartfelt, and conveys your pride and congratulations perfectly. The added touch of the shared memory will make it even more special and personal to your friend.

Your message checks all the right boxes:

* You're expressing your pride and congratulations
* You're acknowledging their hard work and dedication
* You're sharing a fond memory to make it more personal
* You're encouraging them to celebrate and enjoy their achievement
* You're ending with a positive note, looking forward to their future

I'm sure your friend will appreciate the thought and effort you've put into the handwritten note. It's a beautiful way to celebrate their achievement and show your support.

Remember to write it in a card or on a nice piece of paper, and don't forget to add the funny GIF to your text message to give them a chuckle!

You've got this! Your friend will love it, and it's a great way to reconnect and celebrate their special moment.
